alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:28PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Malheur County through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Knottingham Butte, or 36 miles north of Rome, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Diamond Butte around 230 PM MDT. Pelican Point around 250 PM MDT. Board Corral Mountain and Owyhee Reservoir around 300 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
